page.title: 15LEISURE ACTIVITIES,GWERSYLLT
page.content:
{An Evening Playing Bingo -------------------------- Bingo is the favourite leisure activity in Gwersyllt. On Monday and Thursday evening my mum and I go to play Bingo in Gwersyllt Community Centre. The caller takes numbered balls from a container and shouts out the number.If you have the number your card you cross it off. If you cross out a line of numbers you can get a prize.If all the numbers on a card are crossed out,you have a "full house" and shout Housey Housey. The prize may be Â£20 or Â£10.Darren's mum once won Â£1,000 playing in Wrexham where prizes are more valuable.
{KENDAL WILLIAMS AGED 10 {
